description: Department of Trade and Investment Policy - Order to impose a Special Commodity Levy on Peas, Massor Dhal etc. valid for a period of 06 month commencing frm 25.02.2015 and order make to rescind the order made in respect of Maize and Grain Sorghum published in Gaz. Ex. Ord. No. 1885/47 of 24.10.2014 with effect from 25.02.2015
